verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> called יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> unto his sons וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> Gather yourselves together וְאַגִּ֣ידָה <S%H5046><s%> that I may tell לָכֶ֔ם אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what יִקְרָ֥א <S%H7122><s%> you [that] which shall befall אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <S%H319><s%> you in the last הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

הִקָּבְצ֥וּ <S%H6908><s%> Gather yourselves together וְשִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> and hear בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> ye sons יַעֲקֹ֑ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob וְשִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> and hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> unto Israel אֲבִיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> your father

רְאוּבֵן֙ <S%H7205><s%> Reuben בְּכֹ֣רִי <S%H1060><s%> thou [art] my firstborn אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> you כֹּחִ֖י <S%H3581><s%> my might וְרֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> and the beginning אוֹנִ֑י <S%H202><s%> of my strength יֶ֥תֶר <S%H3499><s%> the excellency שְׂאֵ֖ת <S%H7613><s%> of dignity וְיֶ֥תֶר <S%H3499><s%> and the excellency עָֽז׃ <S%H5794><s%> of power

פַּ֤חַז <S%H6349><s%> Unstable כַּמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> as water אַל־ <S%H408><s%> shall not תּוֹתַ֔ר <S%H3498><s%> thou shalt not excel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because עָלִ֖יתָ <S%H5927><s%> because thou wentest up מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <S%H4904><s%> bed אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> to thy father's אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> Then חִלַּ֖לְתָּ <S%H2490><s%> then defiledst thou יְצוּעִ֥י <S%H3326><s%> to my couch עָלָֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> [it] he went up פ

שִׁמְע֥וֹן <S%H8095><s%> Simeon וְלֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> and Levi אַחִ֑ים <S%H251><s%> [are] brethren כְּלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> instruments חָמָ֖ס <S%H2555><s%> of cruelty מְכֵרֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4380><s%> [are in] their habitations

בְּסֹדָם֙ <S%H5475><s%> not thou into their secret אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> come נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> O my soul בִּקְהָלָ֖ם <S%H6951><s%> unto their assembly אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תֵּחַ֣ד <S%H3161><s%> be not thou united כְּבֹדִ֑י <S%H3519><s%> mine honour כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because בְאַפָּם֙ <S%H639><s%> for in their anger הָ֣רְגוּ <S%H2026><s%> they slew אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man וּבִרְצֹנָ֖ם <S%H7522><s%> and in their selfwill עִקְּרוּ־ <S%H6131><s%> they digged down שֽׁוֹר׃ <S%H7794><s%> a wall

אָר֤וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed אַפָּם֙ <S%H639><s%> [be] their anger כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עָ֔ז <S%H5794><s%> for [it was] fierce וְעֶבְרָתָ֖ם <S%H5678><s%> and their wrath כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for קָשָׁ֑תָה <S%H7185><s%> for it was cruel אֲחַלְּקֵ֣ם <S%H2505><s%> I will divide בְּיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> them in Jacob וַאֲפִיצֵ֖ם <S%H6327><s%> and scatter בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> them in Israel ס

יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you יוֹד֣וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> shall praise אַחֶ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> thou [art he] whom thy brethren יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> thy hand בְּעֹ֣רֶף <S%H6203><s%> [shall be] in the neck אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> of thine enemies יִשְׁתַּחֲוּ֥וּ <S%H7812><s%> shall bow down לְךָ֖ בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> children אָבִֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> thy father's

גּ֤וּר <S%H1482><s%> whelp אַרְיֵה֙ <S%H738><s%> [is] a lion's יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah מִטֶּ֖רֶף <S%H2964><s%> from the prey בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> my son עָלִ֑יתָ <S%H5927><s%> thou art gone up כָּרַ֨ע <S%H3766><s%> he stooped down רָבַ֧ץ <S%H7257><s%> he couched כְּאַרְיֵ֛ה <S%H738><s%> as a lion וּכְלָבִ֖יא <S%H3833><s%> and as an old lion מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> who יְקִימֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> who shall rouse him up

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָס֥וּר <S%H5493><s%> shall not depart שֵׁ֙בֶט֙ <S%H7626><s%> The sceptre מִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> from Judah וּמְחֹקֵ֖ק <S%H2710><s%> nor a lawgiver מִבֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between רַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> from between his feet עַ֚ד <S%H5704><s%> against כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> until יָבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> come [שִׁילֹה כ] (שִׁילֹ֔ו <S%H7886><s%> Shiloh ק) וְל֖וֹ יִקְּהַ֥ת <S%H3349><s%> and unto him [shall] the gathering עַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

אֹסְרִ֤י <S%H631><s%> Binding לַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <S%H1612><s%> unto the vine [עִירֹה כ] (עִירֹ֔ו <S%H5895><s%> colt ק) וְלַשֹּׂרֵקָ֖ה <S%H8321><s%> unto the choice vine בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> colt אֲתֹנ֑וֹ <S%H860><s%> and his ass's כִּבֵּ֤ס <S%H3526><s%> he washed בַּיַּ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> in wine לְבֻשׁ֔וֹ <S%H3830><s%> his garments וּבְדַם־ <S%H1818><s%> in the blood עֲנָבִ֖ים <S%H6025><s%> of grapes [סוּתֹה כ] (סוּתֹֽו׃ <S%H5497><s%> clothes ק)

חַכְלִילִ֥י <S%H2447><s%> [shall be] red עֵינַ֖יִם <S%H5869><s%> His eyes מִיָּ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> with wine וּלְבֶן־ <S%H3836><s%> white שִׁנַּ֖יִם <S%H8127><s%> and his teeth מֵחָלָֽב׃ <S%H2461><s%> with milk פ

זְבוּלֻ֕ן <S%H2074><s%> Zebulun לְח֥וֹף <S%H2348><s%> at the haven יַמִּ֖ים <S%H3220><s%> of the sea יִשְׁכֹּ֑ן <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לְח֣וֹף <S%H2348><s%> and he [shall be] for an haven אֳנִיּ֔וֹת <S%H591><s%> of ships וְיַרְכָת֖וֹ <S%H3411><s%> and his border עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> toward צִידֹֽן׃ <S%H6721><s%> [shall be] unto Zidon ס

יִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> Issachar חֲמֹ֣ר <S%H2543><s%> ass גָּ֑רֶם <S%H1634><s%> [is] a strong רֹבֵ֖ץ <S%H7257><s%> couching down בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between הַֽמִּשְׁפְּתָֽיִם׃ <S%H4942><s%> between two burdens

וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> And he saw מְנֻחָה֙ <S%H4496><s%> that rest כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [was] good וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and the land כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for נָעֵ֑מָה <S%H5276><s%> that [it was] pleasant וַיֵּ֤ט <S%H5186><s%> and bowed שִׁכְמוֹ֙ <S%H7926><s%> his shoulder לִסְבֹּ֔ל <S%H5445><s%> to bear וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> and became לְמַס־ <S%H4522><s%> unto tribute עֹבֵֽד׃ <S%H5647><s%> and became a servant ס
דָּ֖ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> shall judge עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> his people כְּאַחַ֖ד <S%H259><s%> as one שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

יְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become דָן֙ <S%H1835><s%> Dan נָחָ֣שׁ <S%H5175><s%> shall be a serpent עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> in דֶ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way שְׁפִיפֹ֖ן <S%H8207><s%> an adder עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> in אֹ֑רַח <S%H734><s%> in the path הַנֹּשֵׁךְ֙ <S%H5391><s%> that biteth עִקְּבֵי־ <S%H6119><s%> heels ס֔וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horse וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> shall fall רֹכְב֖וֹ <S%H7392><s%> so that his rider אָחֽוֹר׃ <S%H268><s%> backward
לִֽישׁוּעָתְךָ֖ <S%H3444><s%> thy salvation קִוִּ֥יתִי <S%H6960><s%> I have waited for יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD

גָּ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad גְּד֣וּד <S%H1416><s%> a troop יְגוּדֶ֑נּוּ <S%H1464><s%> shall overcome וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָגֻ֥ד <S%H1464><s%> him but he shall overcome עָקֵֽב׃ <S%H6119><s%> at the last ס

מֵאָשֵׁ֖ר <S%H836><s%> Out of Asher שְׁמֵנָ֣ה <S%H8082><s%> [shall be] fat לַחְמ֑וֹ <S%H3899><s%> his bread וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he יִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> and he shall yield מַֽעֲדַנֵּי־ <S%H4574><s%> dainties מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> royal ס
נַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> Naphtali אַיָּלָ֣ה <S%H355><s%> [is] a hind שְׁלֻחָ֑ה <S%H7971><s%> let loose הַנֹּתֵ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> he giveth אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> words שָֽׁפֶר׃ <S%H8233><s%> goodly ס

בֵּ֤ן <S%H1121><s%> bough פֹּרָת֙ <S%H6509><s%> [is] a fruitful יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> bough פֹּרָ֖ת <S%H6509><s%> [even] a fruitful עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> over עָ֑יִן <S%H5869><s%> by a well בָּנ֕וֹת <S%H1323><s%> [whose] branches צָעֲדָ֖ה <S%H6805><s%> run עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> over שֽׁוּר׃ <S%H7791><s%> over the wall

וַֽיְמָרֲרֻ֖הוּ <S%H4843><s%> have sorely grieved him וָרֹ֑בּוּ <S%H7232><s%> and shot וַֽיִּשְׂטְמֻ֖הוּ <S%H7852><s%> [at him] and hated him בַּעֲלֵ֥י <S%H1167><s%> archer חִצִּֽים׃ <S%H2671><s%> archer

וַתֵּ֤שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> abode בְּאֵיתָן֙ <S%H386><s%> in strength קַשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H7198><s%> But his bow וַיָּפֹ֖זּוּ <S%H6339><s%> were made strong זְרֹעֵ֣י <S%H2220><s%> and the arms יָדָ֑יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands מִידֵי֙ <S%H3027><s%> by the hands אֲבִ֣יר <S%H46><s%> of the mighty יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> [God] of Jacob מִשָּׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there רֹעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> (from thence [is] the shepherd אֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> the stone יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

מֵאֵ֨ל <S%H410><s%> [Even] by the God אָבִ֜יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father וְיַעְזְרֶ֗ךָּ <S%H5826><s%> who shall help וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> שַׁדַּי֙ <S%H7706><s%> the Almighty וִיבָ֣רְכֶ֔ךָּ <S%H1288><s%> who shall bless בִּרְכֹ֤ת <S%H1293><s%> thee with blessings שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of heaven מֵעָ֔ל <S%H5921><s%> and בִּרְכֹ֥ת <S%H1293><s%> blessings תְּה֖וֹם <S%H8415><s%> of the deep רֹבֶ֣צֶת <S%H7257><s%> that lieth תָּ֑חַת <S%H8478><s%> beneath בִּרְכֹ֥ת <S%H1293><s%> under blessings שָׁדַ֖יִם <S%H7699><s%> of the breasts וָרָֽחַם׃ <S%H7356><s%> and of the womb

בִּרְכֹ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> The blessings אָבִ֗יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father גָּֽבְרוּ֙ <S%H1396><s%> have prevailed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בִּרְכֹ֣ת <S%H1293><s%> above the blessings הוֹרַ֔י <S%H2029><s%> of my progenitors עַֽד־ <S%H5704><s%> Up תַּאֲוַ֖ת <S%H8379><s%> unto the utmost bound גִּבְעֹ֣ת <S%H1389><s%> hills עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> of the everlasting תִּֽהְיֶ֙ין֙ <S%H1961><s%> may they be on לְרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> they shall be on the head יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph וּלְקָדְקֹ֖ד <S%H6936><s%> and on the crown of the head נְזִ֥יר <S%H5139><s%> of him that was separate אֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> from his brethren פ

בִּנְיָמִין֙ <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin זְאֵ֣ב <S%H2061><s%> [as] a wolf יִטְרָ֔ף <S%H2963><s%> shall ravin בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning יֹ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> he shall devour עַ֑ד <S%H5706><s%> the prey וְלָעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and at night יְחַלֵּ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> he shall divide שָׁלָֽל׃ <S%H7998><s%> the spoil

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֑ר <S%H6240><s%> ten וְ֠זֹאת <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> them every דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake לָהֶ֤ם אֲבִיהֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> and this [is it] that their father וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> unto them and blessed אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אִ֛ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is what כְּבִרְכָת֖וֹ <S%H1293><s%> according to his blessing בֵּרַ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> he blessed אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> And he charged אוֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> them and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am נֶאֱסָ֣ף <S%H622><s%> unto them I am to be gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> unto my people קִבְר֥וּ <S%H6912><s%> bury אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲבֹתָ֑י <S%H1><s%> me with my fathers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in הַ֨מְּעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> in the cave אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is in בִּשְׂדֵ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> that [is] in the field עֶפְר֥וֹן <S%H6085><s%> of Ephron הַֽחִתִּֽי׃ <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite

בַּמְּעָרָ֞ה <S%H4631><s%> In the cave אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which בִּשְׂדֵ֧ה <S%H7704><s%> that [is] in the field הַמַּכְפֵּלָ֛ה <S%H4375><s%> of Machpelah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> which [is] before מַמְרֵ֖א <S%H4471><s%> Mamre בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which קָנָ֨ה <S%H7069><s%> bought אַבְרָהָ֜ם <S%H85><s%> which Abraham אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> with the field מֵאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> עֶפְרֹ֥ן <S%H6085><s%> of Ephron הַחִתִּ֖י <S%H2850><s%> the Hittite לַאֲחֻזַּת־ <S%H272><s%> for a possession קָֽבֶר׃ <S%H6913><s%> of a buryingplace

שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> There קָֽבְר֞וּ <S%H6912><s%> There they buried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְרָהָ֗ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרָ֣ה <S%H8283><s%> and Sarah אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife שָׁ֚מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there קָבְר֣וּ <S%H6912><s%> there they buried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> רִבְקָ֣ה <S%H7259><s%> and Rebekah אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וְשָׁ֥מָּה <S%H8033><s%> and there קָבַ֖רְתִּי <S%H6912><s%> and there I buried אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵאָֽה׃ <S%H3812><s%> Leah

מִקְנֵ֧ה <S%H4735><s%> The purchase הַשָּׂדֶ֛ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וְהַמְּעָרָ֥ה <S%H4631><s%> and of the cave אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּ֖וֹ מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> that [is] therein [was] from the children חֵֽת׃ <S%H2845><s%> of Heth

וַיְכַ֤ל <S%H3615><s%> had made an end יַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> And when Jacob לְצַוֹּ֣ת <S%H6680><s%> of commanding אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> he gathered up רַגְלָ֖יו <S%H7272><s%> his feet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַמִּטָּ֑ה <S%H4296><s%> into the bed וַיִּגְוַ֖ע <S%H1478><s%> and yielded up the ghost וַיֵּאָ֥סֶף <S%H622><s%> and was gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his עַמָּֽיו׃ <S%H5971><s%> unto his people
